titleStmt.title: Divine meditations written by an honourable person ; whereto is adjoyned a determination of the question, whether men ought to keele at the receipt of the holy communion ; and an essay of friends.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Badger for Humphrey Mosley,

notesStmt.note: "An essay of friendship," p. [133] - 154 has special t.p. dated 1640.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
